input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
East Carolina Pirates Men's Executive Watch

Item specifications:
Links Make Watch Adjustable
Stainless Steel
Men
23kt Gold-Plated Bezel
Officially Licensed East Carolina Pirates Men's Two Tone Gold Dress Watch
input_text.Response A: This stainless steel watch with a two-tone gold finish and a 23kt gold-plated bezel features the official East Carolina Pirates logo on a white dial. The stainless steel link bracelet is adjustable and will fit wrists from 7.5" to 9.5" around. The watch is water resistant to 30 meters. It comes with a limited lifetime warranty.
input_text.Response B: This elegant men's two tone gold dress watch from the East Carolina Pirates collection is perfect for any occasion. Made from stainless steel, this watch features a 23kt gold-plated bezel and a black leather strap. The watch's crystal is scratch resistant and the movement is quartz. This watch is officially licensed by the East Carolina Pirates and comes with a two-year warranty. Links make the watch adjustable to fit most wrist sizes.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: I've assumed that where the generated text includes facts not included in the prompt, that that is not behaviour you want.
label_annotations.factors_b: I've assumed that where the generated text includes facts not included in the prompt, that that is not behaviour you want.
